select-admin-announcements-policy.name: select-admin-announcements-policy
select-admin-announcements-policy.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM "profiles"
        WHERE "profiles"."id" = (select auth.uid())
        AND "profiles"."role" = 'admin'
      )

insert-admin-announcements-policy.name: insert-admin-announcements-policy
insert-admin-announcements-policy.withCheck:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM "profiles"
        WHERE "profiles"."id" = (select auth.uid())
        AND "profiles"."role" = 'admin'
      )
